#summary timeSelect(objectName,property[order,separator,minuteStep])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing three select form controls for a time based on the supplied `objectName` and `property`.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true || - || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *property* || string || true || - || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *order* || string || false || month,day,year || Use to change the order of or exclude time select tags ||
|| *separator* || string || false ||   || Use to change the character that is displayed between the time select tags ||
|| *minuteStep* || numeric || false || 1 || Pass in `10` to only show minute 10, 20,30 etc ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#timeSelect(objectName="business", property="openUntil")#</p>	
</cfoutput>
}}}
